column2: Profile Summary  The main goal of this role is to plan, execute, and coordinate outreach initiatives for the organizations events, aiming to enhance brand reputation, foster meaningful connections, and contribute to  overall success and impact.  Key Roles and Responsibilities   Plan interactive strategies for the existing programs and initiate new events.    Creating and updating the event master sheet and folders after discussing it with the team.    Maintain Dropbox sharing and updating all outreach docs with relevant departments and teams   PAN India.   Manage event deadlines and file timely reports on event status.   Lead On-Field execution of the event.   Manage the logistics requirements of the event.    Closing the events and submission of various feedback and internal reports.   Coordinate with other departments for event conduction   Manage all event data and save the complete repository and know how to extract it when needed   Utilizing various channels such as social media, email marketing, and promotional materials.    Knowledge of online meeting platforms like Zoom, Meet, Microsoft Teams, etc is desirable.    Knowledge of budgeting is Desirable.    Knowledge of event CRMs is an added advantage.   Knowledge   Education- Bachelor's degree preferably in Event  Management/Mass Communication/MBA  (Marketing)/Engineering.    Experience: 2 - 5 years, of proven experience.    Strong knowledge of planning and execution of corporate and educational events.    Skills     Experience conducting on-field events of more than 300 footfalls will be an added advantage.    Excellent communication (written & verbal)   Active in representing the organization on the field.    Highly organized with strong attention to detail.   Interpersonal skills  Attitude   Adaptive to challenging environment   Proactive, results-oriented and organized   Willingness to collaborate and coordinate with different departments and team members   Should be flexible to travel & timing Others / Perks     Young and vibrant team   Fast-paced and growth-minded culture   Visibility and influence   Networking opportunity   Professional growth and recognition  Stakeholders  Internal - All Departments and working closely with the CEO to understand expectations w.r.t the   planning and execution of corporate events  External - Our Clients (Principals, Teachers), Students, Parents, Vendors

column2: Promote exhibitions, conferences, seminars, and road shows through tele-calling and email campaigns              Manage database with accurate data entry and ability to coordinate activities              Work on event coordination/vendor management/visitor promotion/media coordination, etc.                Incumbent Profile:                  Should be fluent in English with excellent written and spoken communication and presentation skills                  Should be outgoing and customer-service oriented possessing inter-personal communication skills with an ability to interact.                Qualification: The candidate should at least be a graduate. Management graduates preferred.              Candidates with minimum 1 -2 years of experience.

column2: Exhibitions India Private Limited is looking for Visitor Promotion Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Assisting with the preparation of operating budgets, financial statements, and reports.      Processing requisition and other business forms, checking account balances, and approving purchases.      Advising other departments on best practices related to fiscal procedures.      Managing account records, issuing invoices, and handling payments.      Collaborating with internal departments to reconcile any accounting discrepancies.      Analyzing financial data and assisting with audits, reviews, and tax preparations.      Updating financial spreadsheets and reports with the latest available data.      Reviewing existing financial policies and procedures to ensure regulatory compliance.      Providing assistance with payroll administration.      Keeping records and documenting financial processes.
